title: Incomplete Front of Manger
description:
Incomplete front of limestone manger with standing bull in sunk relief facing oblong manger at right. Remains of red paint. Ends of manger curved.
Condition: Incomplete. Bull preserved to neck. Cement has been laid over left surface obscuring modeling. On scattered parts of body of bull, clear remains of red paint.
credit_line: Gift of the Egypt Exploration Society

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
